# Phase 2 F1700-230184 – Saltwater Intake and Pumphouse Upgrade

Announcement of the Invitations to Qualify for a Contract to Upgrade the Saltwater Intakes and Pumphouse at the Pacific Science Enterprise Centre (PSEC) Facility

**Contract Details:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting qualified contractors to participate in the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) process for a contract to upgrade the saltwater intakes and pumphouse at the Fisheries and Oceans Canada – Pacific Science Enterprise Centre (PSEC) facility. 

The successful contractor will be required to complete the following tasks:

* Upgrade the pumphouse and saltwater intakes at the PSEC facility
* Install a new intake manifold to combine three intakes into two supply (or "inlet") pipes
* Replace two existing pumps with two vertical turbine pumps
* Reconnect all existing pipes, electrical and control conduits, and municipal water flushing lines
* Upgrade existing drainage infrastructure and electrical conduits

**Contract Specifications:**

* Reference Number: WS4098439977-Doc4131117431

* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 March 2024
* Contract Category: CNST
* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Contact Information:**

For further information, please contact Simon Leung at [simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Important Instructions:**

All interested contractors must submit their information through the invitations to qualify (ITQ) process by the closing date. Please ensure that you read and follow all instructions carefully.

**Related Services:**

The successful contractor will be required to provide the following services:

* Rock removal service
* Earthmoving service
* Plumbing construction services
* Concrete installation and repair services

Note: The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.
